data.text:
I’ve spent around 10 night there , everything was amazing (location,facilities,cleanliness,)
Special thanks for Kenza for making my stay more comfortable and always checking if I need anything 
Highly suggested ,thanks for having me..

Edge Creekside Hotel
owner_response.author: Ashraf Abdeen

data.text: The room was amazing and the service was really great. I had no issues at all throughout my stay and staff were very friendly . The food was nice and the buffet timing was extended so it was easier on days when I woke up late. I even called the reception around 12 in the night and still they helped me with my queries. I got the sea facing view room and had an amazing experience
data.title: Happy and peaceful stay

data.text: When arrived late at the hotel I was well received by Ms Iman who helped me to sort my booking and to give me a good room. Every thing in the hotel was in order. Clean room, great staff, fantastic location where one can go to excellent restaurants and cafes in few minutes.
data.title: Excellent hôtel, great location and friendly staff.

data.text:
Excellent hotel, clean, well equipped. 

Very spacious room at a limited cost for Dubai. 

Good breakfast with lot of choice and at a limited cost. 

Friendly and helpful staff.

Attention to location which is a bit decentralised compared to various hot spots of Dubai.
data.title: Excellent stay in Dubai in beautiful hotel

data.text:
Staying 9 nights in a double bedrooms appartment.
14th floor, clean, spacious, well designed, and modern style.
Beds are large and really confortable.
All you need is provided there.

Staff: 
So nice and professional, always taking Care about our needs and always ready to help when necessary.
We won t forger them.
Really our great and sincere thanks to Mr Ashraf, Mss Kenza and Mss Imane at réception who help us to have a so great stay at creek side hotel.

Breakfast included, quantités, qualités  of food are there to satisfy all our tastes. Staff is also reactive and helpful.

Finally, one of my best hôtel ever, We  enjoyed our 2nd trip in Dubaï and edge creek side hotel and its staff have a wide contribution to our satisfaction.
data.title: Wonderful hôtel and great staff
